descriptors: 酒精饮料和烟草的提及

node.display_long_description:
NEW HOLIDAY LOBBY UPDATE IS NOW LIVE!

PokerStars, the world’s leading poker brand, has combined live and online poker in a truly immersive VR experience.

-Study your opponents, pick up on their tells, and chat in real time
-Handle your chips and cards, just as you would at a real-world poker table
-Keep the table fun with interactive props and toys, summoned in an instant

This is the most exciting poker game on the planet, and there’s a seat open for you right now.

- Key Features -

-Authentic poker, blackjack & slots action
-A fully immersive, social experience
-Simple, intuitive, easy to play
-Play real opponents
-Realistic physics, from cards and chips to balloons, pistols and more
-Unlock free chips every day
-Certified RNG

- Exotic locales -

-Medieval Castle
-Cyber Apartment
-Evil Volcano Lair
-Macau 2050
-The Galaxy Space Station
-Macau Suite
-The Showdown Saloon
-The Monte-Carlo Yacht
-The Void

nodes.title: New Interactive Poker Tutorial & Holiday Packs Update!
nodes.body_text:
Hey PokerStars VR players The Interactive Tutorial and Holiday Pack Update has arrived in [Patch 55] and is now live for download!

New Features
-New Poker Basics Tutorial
-Real time lighting enabled for player avatars on Quest 2
-Full game self exclusion
-Holiday Pack & Holiday High Roller Pack available for a limited time

Existing Feature Improvements / Modifications
-Lobby Slots Visual Update
-Christmas Lobby Music

Bug Fixes
-Rare bug where avatars not cleaning up after player leaves match
-Holo helpers update frequency increased on Quest

nodes.title: The Holiday Update
nodes.body_text:
Hey PokerStars VR players The Holiday Update has arrived [Patch 54] is now live for download!

This update patch includes the Xmas Lobby, a new gifting feature a brand new slot machine Gold Dragon Red Dragon and a MASSIVE CPU performance improvement for Quest & PC!

We're launching the gifting feature with a time-limited Gift & Receive Bonus! When you send your first gift in PokerStars VR of chips or creds you'll receive the same gift as a special bonus so spread the holiday cheer!

New Features
-Gold Dragon Red Dragon Slots
-Gifting Feature
-Big CPU performance upgrade for Quest & PC

Bug Fixes
- Audio slider not working in Yacht and Macau 2050
- Fixed incorrect skin on shield for high roller medieval pack popup and cover art
- Eye Stress Ball Fixes

node.reviewDescription: I love the game. It is strategic and you have a little luck sometimes. The issue I have are the kids that do not understand it and the Props that distract from the game. I will provide 3 recommendation to improve the game itself. When walk into the main lobby have a door that leads to the right and one to the left. The one to the right can be marked Prop room where the kids can use the props without taking away from the game. The room to the left can be a learn basic poker room where newbies can either watch games or play and learn from someone giving tutorials on the game cards face up. Not necessarily all of the statistic stuff, just the basics on how to pick up chips, how to fold, why you don't go all in every time.

developerResponse.body: Hey Bill_Desmond, thanks for the helpful feedback! Please reach out to us on our Discord.gg/PokerStarsVR #feature-requests channel for these great ideas and we'll look into them. We continue to work on moderation as a top priority. Please use the in-game reporting system for any underage players or trolls as we do weekly bans based on them. Also, higher stakes cash games and any level Spin & Gos should have more serious poker players. Lastly, we have our Void room where distracting props are limited in which could make for a more relaxing experience.

website_page_meta.description:
NEW HOLIDAY LOBBY UPDATE IS NOW LIVE!

Step into the future with this game-changing release from the biggest name in the business. Visually stunning environments; realistic chip and card movements; an endless supply of interactive toys, props and accessories; and the world’s best poker software powering multiplayer Texas Hold’em action.
website_page_meta.title: PokerStars VR · Oculus Quest
